title: LP HELP
body:
Hi all,

So recently I've been having some strange things happen with my lp gain. Just a quick note, I'm not on a losing streak and my win streak for the past 20 games is above 50%. 

Anyways, so I've been gaining only like 16 lp lately instead of my usual 22 - 25, and it even got as bad as **_8_** in my past game. Now, I know that you'll most likely be thinking it's because my mmr is so much lower than my division, however, when I've been losing I've onl y lost 15 oor 16 lp in the past couple of games? 

Really confused, would like a rioters input on this.

Thanks.

replies.body:
I've had the same issue, 8 LP from last game's victory. I think it has something to do with Riot activating Loss Forgiven for the teams who have disconnecting players pending this connection issue.
 It's a pain in the {{champion:22}}. Not worth playing ranked atm as i'm bound to lose more LP than I gain with LP offset enabled.
Agreed. Wanted to grind games for Gold, but if I'm getting 8 lp per win and 16 or so per loss, don't know if it'll be worth the hassle...
